basic_information.scholarship_name: Finney Scholars Scholarship for Criminal Justice

description: This scholarship honors Dr. Frank Finney, Jr. In 1971, he became the first dean of the newly-formed College of Liberal Arts. Dr. Finney was passionate about developing the creative potential of students and giving them a sound background in their academic disciplines. "The Finney" recognizes Liberal Arts students who are identified as having a proven record of high academic achievement in their major. Eligibility Requirements Criminal Justice Major 3.5 GPA in chosen major 3.5 GPA overall Full-time undergraduate or graduate student Committee may request further documentation which could include proof of excellence through Criminal Justice coursework or activities Continuing in the fall semester that the scholarship is awarded

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
